articles.title: Mike Vrabel on the AFC Championship game, Kayshon Boutte, and responding to Ty Law’s claims
articles.description:
Vrabel also discussed his players being motivated by ESPN predictions, Will Campbell, and the role that winter weather played against the Texans.

The post Mike Vrabel on the AFC Championship game, Kayshon Boutte, and responding to Ty Law’s claims appeared first on Boston.com.
